p: These minigenome systems have been used on either small-scale or in high-throughput systems for identification of lead compounds such as angelicin derivates and benzoquinolones [101], MCCB4-8 [102], the two anticancer drugs 6-azauridine and 2′-deoxy-2′-fluorocytidine [103], and VER-155008, a heat-shock protein (hsp)70 inhibitor [104]. However, to date, none of these compounds has been taken into the clinical phase for use as antivirals.
